mapper.sql: ID, DOC_ID, TITLE, CLIENT_ID, CHECK_DATE, CURRENT_STATUS, CURRENT_OPERATOR, CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME, RECORD_ID, REMIND_TYPE, ACCESS_USER, EDITABLE_USER, CREATED_DATETIME, WORK_PHONE, PHONE, SECURITY_LEVEL, SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL, URGENCY_LEVEL, URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON, HAS_STOCK_TRADING, UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE, VERSION
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from CRT_EXPIRED_RECORD
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CRT_EXPIRED_RECORD (ID, DOC_ID, TITLE, CLIENT_ID, CHECK_DATE, CURRENT_STATUS, CURRENT_OPERATOR, CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME, RECORD_ID, REMIND_TYPE, ACCESS_USER, EDITABLE_USER, CREATED_DATETIME, WORK_PHONE, PHONE, SECURITY_LEVEL, SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL, URGENCY_LEVEL, URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON, HAS_STOCK_TRADING, UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE, VERSION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remindType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editableUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityLevelDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgencyLevelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasStockTrading,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{unifiedsocialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update CRT_EXPIRED_RECORD
DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CURRENT_STATUS = #{currentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_OPERATOR = #{currentOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME = #{currentActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EDITABLE_USER = #{editableUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

HAS_STOCK_TRADING = #{hasStockTrading,jdbcType=CHAR},
UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE = #{unifiedsocialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CRT_EXPIRED_RECORD set DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENT_STATUS = #{currentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_OPERATOR = #{currentOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME = #{currentActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMIND_TYPE = #{remindType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCESS_USER = #{accessUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDITABLE_USER = #{editableUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATETIME = #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WORK_PHONE = #{workPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_LEVEL = #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL = #{securityLevelDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URGENCY_LEVEL = #{urgencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON = #{urgencyLevelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HAS_STOCK_TRADING = #{hasStockTrading,jdbcType=CHAR}, UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE = #{unifiedsocialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
